definitions.definition: Able to be related to something else; connected with.
examples: The damage was relatable to the recent earthquake.

definitions.definition: Able to be related to on a personal level.
examples: The characters in the play are very warm and relatable .

definitions.definition: Able to be passed on verbally ; capable of being narrated or suitable for relating .
examples: His verbal abuse was not relatable to polite ears.

main_definition: Able to be related to something else; connected with.
secondary_definitions: Able to be related to on a personal level.
Able to be passed on verbally ; capable of being narrated or suitable for relating .
